casebody.data:
HOOD
v.
HUNT. No. 403P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of August 2005 by Plaintiff To Proceed as Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of August 2005."
